about_the_game:
Enter the world of Awen

A dark force has spread through the land corrupting everything in it's path.  You have been tasked with restoring the balance.

You will have to overcome dark foes and use your magic to heal and restore the natural order.

Large Open World

If you're tired of linear "on-rails" VR games, Awen is a huge world to explore.  You can progress in your own way and engage with as much or as little content as you want.

Visceral Combat

Tactile and satisfying melee and bow combat.  Melee combat in VR is often awkward due to the weightlessness of the weapon.  Awen leans into that with a more fantasy approach to weapons with elaborate effects.

Gesture-based Spell System

Magic is the core of your characters abilities.  The gesture-based casting system is natural and intuitive allows you to weave and sling spells fluidly and quickly.

Learn powerful new spells as you progress and spend skill points augmenting your existing spells

content_descriptors.notes:
The mature content in this game is limited to realistic damage in the sense of blood spray and splatter when enemies take take from certain weapons.  
There are no other mature themes.

name: Awen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR - SteamVR and Oculus. Tested with Vive, Quest and Index. Windows Mixed Reality not supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 8-Core - Ryzen 4 or Intel 12th Gen
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR - SteamVR and Oculus. Tested with Vive, Quest and Index. Windows Mixed Reality not supported

short_description: Awen is a large Open world fantasy VR RPG. When creating Awen we aimed to make every aspect of the gameplay uncompromised, from movement to combat. Combat is visceral and satisfying. Exploration and progress is open-ended. Come explore the world of Awen.
